properties.entry: SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectTotalCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_TYPE = 1

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#selectBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_TYPE , C.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_BODY , C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD C JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#insertBoard() */ INTO TBL_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_CATEGORY B ON (A.CATEGORY_CODE = B.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardCount() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD A WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_BODY LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_TYPE , C.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_BODY , C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD C JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_TYPE , C.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_BODY , C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD C JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_TYPE , C.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_BODY , C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD C JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#searchBoardList() */ A.RNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , A.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , A.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_BODY , B.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , B.BOARD_COUNT , B.CREATED_DATE , B.BOARD_STATUS FROM (SELECT C.BOARD_NO , C.BOARD_TYPE , C.CATEGORY_CODE , D.CATEGORY_NAME , C.BOARD_TITLE , C.BOARD_BODY , C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , C.BOARD_COUNT , C.CREATED_DATE , C.BOARD_STATUS FROM TBL_BOARD C JOIN TBL_CATEGORY D ON (C.CATEGORY_CODE = D.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(C.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY C.BOARD_NO DESC ) B WHERE B.BOARD_BODY LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#insertThumbnailContent() */ INTO TBL_BOARD A ( A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL , 2 , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT /* com.greedy.jsp.board.model.dao.BoardDAO#insertAttachment() */ INTO TBL_ATTACHMENT A ( A.ATTACHMENT_NO , A.REF_BOARD_NO , A.ORIGINAL_NAME , A.SAVED_NAME , A.SAVE_PATH , A.FILE_TYPE , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , B.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.BOARD_NO = C.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.FILE_TYPE = 'TITLE' ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC
UPDATE TBL_BOARD A SET A.BOARD_COUNT = (SELECT B.BOARD_COUNT FROM TBL_BOARD B WHERE B.BOARD_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_BODY , A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE , C.ATTACHMENT_NO , C.ORIGINAL_NAME , C.SAVED_NAME , C.SAVE_PATH , C.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.BOARD_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT C ON (A.BOARD_NO = C.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_NO = ?
